item.title: Bungee Las Vegas Spring Break 2000
item.description: It’s a shame that this place no longer exists. I believe the tower is still there, but hasn’t been operational for a long time.

item.title: HELICOPTER HUGHES 500 WITH NO DOORS TOUR OVER KAUAI
item.description: No doors is the way to go! Just way more fun and no reflections on camera shots too.

item.title: Helicopter Ride Over Seattle
item.description: After 9 years of living in Seattle I thought I had seen the whole city. I was wrong.

item.title: SCUBA DIVING KONA HAWAII GARDEN EEL COVE 2003
item.description: Went with Jack’s Diving Locker and it was a blast!

item.title: SCUBA DIVING KONA HAWAII MANTA RAY NIGHT DIVE 2003
item.description: Only one Manta Ray showed up, but that is better than none!

item.title: SEATTLE SEGWAY
item.description: These were way easier and way more fun to ride than I had expected. Of course it rained on us towards the end.

item.title: SKYJUMP LAS VEGAS – 855 FEET!
item.description: For being way higher than the bungee jumps that I’ve done, this really wasn’t bad at all. It’s a nice almost “gentle” fall to the ground below.

item.title: SNOWBOARDING AT SUMMIT WITH NEW SAMSUNG 360 CAMERA
item.description: Heading down the lower part of Alpine at Summit Central.

item.title: WASHINGTON BRIDGE BUNGEE JUMP OVER 200 FEET
item.description: With GoPros around now this video footage would be a lot better.

item.title: Wakeboarding on the Willamette
item.description: Clouds couldn’t stop a good time.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’ve always been a huge fan of new technology and how it can shape the future. PROFESSIONAL SITE Basically my LinkedIn profile in another form. ONLINE RESUME Condensed version of my professional site. TECHNOLOGY LEADERSHIP IN TEST Kind of makes sense considering my career field.

item.title: Interests
item.description: Anything to force me away from a computer and technology for a while. Things like snowboarding, skiing, wakeboarding, whitewater rafting, scuba diving, and traveling. FOOD (SMOKING, PRESSURE COOKING, SOUS VIDE) Because eating is fun and cooking is kind of interesting. TRAVELING (GOOGLE MAP OF PLACES THAT I HAVE VISITED) Places that I want to go: * Australia and New Zealand * Southern Europe (Spain, France, Italy, Greece) * Asia (Japan, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Thailand, etc)
